title: Understanding Encryption
text: Encryption is a method used to protect data by converting it into a format that is unreadable without a special key.

hintAnswer: by converting data into a coded format that can only be read by someone with the decryption key
title: How Encryption Works
text: Encryption protects sensitive information by converting data into a coded format that can only be read by someone with the decryption key.
choices: by converting data into a coded format that can only be read by someone with the decryption key
by physically securing the data in a locked room
by deleting the data after use
